messages.zh: 4-1 免费拥抱（下）
messages.en: 4-1 Free Hugs (part 2)

messages.zh: ......已经到达目标地点。
messages.en: ......Arrived at destination.

messages.zh: 消灭了路上徘徊着的小股整合运动。除此之外，没有发现其它异常情况。
messages.en: Took out small packs of Reunion Movement along the way. Besides that, nothing unusual.

messages.zh: 报告完毕。
messages.en: Over.

messages.zh: 霜叶......你一路怎么老皱着眉头？
messages.en: Frostleaf…...Why are you frowning all the way?

messages.zh: 我只是有点在意阿米娅她们的状况。
messages.en: I just worried about Amiya’s situation.

messages.zh: 阿米娅她们已经回到罗德岛了。
messages.en: Amiya and the others have already returned to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 临光和杜宾一个星期前就已动身前往什么地方——
messages.en: Nearl and Dobermann set off to someplace a week ago——

messages.zh: 同时出动她们两个，应该是挺艰难的任务。
messages.en: Sending out the two of them at the same time, it must be a really hard mission.

messages.zh: 黑钢和企鹅物流也有自己的事情要处理。
messages.en: Blacksteel and Penguin Logistics also have their business to attend to.

messages.zh: 啊，雷蛇前辈和芙兰卡前辈......
messages.en: Ah, senior Liskarm and senior Franka……

messages.zh: 她们平安就好......
messages.en: I hope they’re OK…...

messages.zh: 你也要好好加油才行。
messages.en: You need to keep up the good work too.

messages.zh: 芙兰卡把你交到我手上的时候，可是很看好你的。
messages.en: When Franka handed you to me, she spoke very highly of you.
R…...really?

messages.zh: ——她说，前提是你别那么怯生生的。
messages.en: ——she said, as long as you stop being so shy…..

messages.zh: ......别突然就一副要哭出来的样子呀！你可是黑钢的一员......！
messages.en: ......Don’t go crying all of a sudden! You are a member of Blacksteel!
I, I’m not….

messages.zh: ......不管怎么说，我们接下来的任务，就是要侦查这个废城的各个区域。
messages.en: ......Whatever you say, our next mission, is to scout areas of this city ruin.

messages.zh: 虽然不是什么特别危险的任务，但也得小心谨慎。
messages.en: Though it’s not a particularly dangerous mission, we have to be cautious.

messages.zh: 嗯，嗯。
messages.en: Yes, yes.

messages.zh: 了解。
messages.en: Got it.

messages.zh: 接下来......该是我们认真工作的时候了。
messages.en: Well then…...it’s time for us to get to work.

messages.zh: 啊......博士，你来了。
messages.en: Oh…….Doctor, you’re here.

messages.zh: 来得刚好，Dr.{@nickname}。
messages.en: Just in time, Dr.___.

messages.zh: 我们这边的活儿也干的差不多了，得暂时离开一段时间~
messages.en: We’ve almost finished our jobs here, and we’ll have to leave for a while~

messages.zh: （惋惜）
messages.en: (Feel sorry)

messages.zh: 很快就能再见面的。
messages.en: We’ll meet again soon.

messages.zh: 只要过一小段时间，我们就能回到罗德岛重新待命。
messages.en: Just for a short time, and we can return to Rhodes Island and await orders.

messages.zh: 可不要太想我哦。
messages.en: Don’t miss me too much.

messages.zh: 唉唉，可惜可惜，我们这边没有那样的正经理由呢，德克萨斯。
messages.en: Huh huh, what a shame, we haven’t got serious reasons like they do, Texas.

messages.zh: 你给我等等......
messages.en: You wait a second…..

messages.zh: 企鹅物流马上要回去休假咯！
messages.en: Penguin Logistics is going off for vacation!

messages.zh: 虽然只有宝贵的一天，但是！但是——
messages.en: Although we’ve got only one precious day, However! However——

messages.zh: ......抱歉。不是适合在这种场合说的东西。
messages.en: .......Apologies. It’s not something to speak about here.

messages.zh: 不会......休息也是必要的。
messages.en: It’s okay……Rest is essential as well.

messages.zh: ......这句话，理应是我说给你听。
messages.en: ......These words, should be given the other way around.

messages.zh: 没错没错。阿米娅，你啊，也该好好休息一下了。
messages.en: That’s right that’s right. Amiya, you, should be taking a good rest now.

messages.zh: 罗德岛还有必须要处理的事情......
messages.en: Rhodes Island still has matters to attend to……

messages.zh: 我能理解，但是阿米娅，你可不能给自己太多压力。
messages.en: I can understand, but Amiya, you can't put too much pressure on yourself.

messages.zh: 即使信念强大，一直劳累下去，身体也会承受不住的。
messages.en: However strong your will is, your body can’t keep up if you keep pushing yourself like this.

messages.zh: 你可不能病倒了，大家都指望着你呢。
messages.en: You cannot fall ill now, everyone is counting on you.

messages.zh: 我......一直受到大家的关照。
messages.en: I……have always been care for by everyone.

messages.zh: 但你战斗的身姿也鼓励了大家。
messages.en: But the way you fought encouraged everyone as well.

messages.zh: 不论如何，这就够了。
messages.en: Anyway, this is enough.

messages.zh: 趁这个机会，我要去罗德岛做个免费的身体检查，然后再回去。
messages.en: Taking this opportunity, I’ll go to Rhodes Island for a free physical examination before going back.

messages.zh: 我们的任务也差不多结束了。接下来......
messages.en: Our mission’s almost finished as well. And then…...

messages.zh: 阿米娅，{@nickname}博士。
messages.en: Amiya, Dr.___.

messages.zh: 我在听。
messages.en: I’m listening.

messages.zh: 加油~                                                 Cheer up !
messages.en: Brighten up~                               Cheer up!
Ah…...what?

messages.zh: 汇报结束之后，我们会立即返回。
messages.en: After finishing our report, we’ll return immediately.

messages.zh: 很快就能再见面的。
messages.en: We’ll meet again very soon.
Everybody….I…….
.......Yeah. Please take care of yourselves.

messages.zh: 下次再见。
messages.en: See you next time.

messages.zh: 博士。
messages.en: Doctor.

messages.zh: 我得再去龙门外围的贫民窟看看。应该能帮上忙。
messages.en: I’ll go to check out the slum in the outskirts of Lungmen again, I should be of help there.

messages.zh: （担心）
messages.en: (Worry)

messages.zh: 没事的，博士。
messages.en: It’s okay, doctor.

messages.zh: 红正在龙门执行其他任务。
messages.en: Projekt Red is onto other missions in Lungmen.

messages.zh: 有她在，你可以放心。
messages.en: With her around, you can be assured.
